00020 class VariableAttributeListener
00021 {
00022 public:
00023     VariableAttributeListener();
00024
00026     virtual ~VariableAttributeListener();
00027

00029     // To prevent usuage of SetUSerData from the user side

00033     friend class ServiceProxy;

00044
